name: NoFap
description:
NoFap is a website and community forum that serves as a support group for those who wish to give up pornography and masturbation. Its name comes from the slang term 'fap', referring to male masturbation.

While reasons for this avoidance vary by individual, the main motivation cited is attempting to overcome addiction to pornography, or other compulsive sexual behaviours.Other reasons include religious and moral reasons, self-improvement, and physical beliefs that are not supported by medicine.

The expression "fap" is an onomatopoeic Internet slang term for male masturbation that first appeared in the 1999 web comic Sexy Losers to indicate the sound of a male character masturbating
